entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
